# The gettext extension

This extension provides support for GNU gettext using NLS (Native Language
Support) API.

## Configuration options

### PHP_EXT_GETTEXT

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enables the extension.

### PHP_EXT_GETTEXT_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Builds extension as shared.
